product_specification.In The Box: Handset, Adapter, USB Type C Cable, Sim Eject Tool, Quick Start Guide, Warranty Card
product_specification.Other Display Features: 120Hz Touch Sampling Rate, Screen-to-Body Ratio: 90.5%, NTSC Colour Gamut Coverage: 70%, Aspect Ratio: 20.6:9, Contrast Ratio: 1500:1, Brightness: 400nits
product_specification.Operating Frequency: 2G GSM: B2/B3/B5/B8, 3G WCDMA: B1/B5/B8, 4G LTE: B1/B3/B5/8/B40/B41
product_specification.Primary Camera Features: Dual Camera Setup: 50MP Primary Camera (f/1.8 Aperture) + 2MP Depth Sensor
product_specification.Video Recording Resolution: Rear: 1080p (at 30 fps), 720p (at 30 fps) | Front: 1080p (at 30 fps), 720p (at 30 fps)
product_specification.Sensors: Ultrasonic Fingerprint Sensor, Accelerometer, Barometer, Gyro Sensor, Geomagnetic Sensor, Hall Sensor, Proximity Sensor, RGB Light Sensor
product_specification.Audio Formats: MP4, M4V, MKV, XVID, WAV, AAC, MP3, AMR, FLAC, APE
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Warranty for Phone and 6 Months Warranty for In-Box Accessories

product_description.Unmatched Performance: This phone comes with Qualcomm Snapdragon 680 processor with 6 nm architecture that gives a speed superiority to your phone that in turn helps to play games, finish up tasks, and multitask with ease.
product_description.Lightening-fast Storage: With UFS 2.2 storage, you can get more done in less time. UFS 2.2 is incorporated with the device aiming to provide you a blazing-fast operational efficiency while consuming less energy.
product_description.Powerful Battery: The large 6000 mAh battery can provide you with hours of faultless fun. Be it gaming or streaming your favourite movie this device goes on and on for a long time.
product_description.Blazing-fast Charging: The Redmi 10 is capable of 18 W rapid charging. It will allow you to be on the move and often without having to hunker down to charge your phone.
product_description.Enthralling Display: Redmi 10 sports an astonishing 17.04 cm (6.71) display with an innovative 20.6:9 aspect ratio for an engaging user experience.
product_description.Safe Streaming: Redmi 10 comes with Widevine L1 support, which provides a great degree of security while allowing you to enjoy HD content from anywhere at any time.
product_description.Magical 50 MP Camera: With a 50 MP dual camera and a 2 MP depth sensor, you can shoot incredible pictures with excellent quality, good detail, and true-to-life colours.
product_description.A Myriad of Camera Modes: This phone comes with a plethora of features such as Pro Mode, Night Mode, HDR, Movie Frame, and Google Lens that will help you capture memories for a lifetime at any time of the day or night.
product_description.Exceptional Design: The Redmi 10 boasts a stunning textured back and a smudge-free finish. Thereby, making it look attractive and always keeping the beholder in the limelight.
product_description.Attractive Colours: Redmi 10 offers different colours for you to slay with. Midnight Black, Pacific Blue, and Caribbean Green are the three attractive colours available for the Redmi 10.
product_description.Fingerprint Sensor: The fingerprint sensor has been included inside the camera module enabling a superior level of security & privacy.

answers: A:Yes, Redmi 10 can run two WhatsApp accounts using Dual Apps. You can enable Dual Apps for a lot of other applications besides WhatsApp, for eg. Facebook.
A:Redmi 10 runs MIUI 13 out of the box based on Android 11.
A:Yes, the camera on Redmi 10 comes with a major upgrade of a 50MP dual camera setup. Supporting the primary camera is the 2MP depth sensor and 5MP front camera.
A:Yes, the Redmi 10 comes with Dual Standby Dual VoLTE. So you can use two Jio SIM cards or two VoLTE SIM cards at the same time. It also has VoWiFi to enable better call clarity using WiFi.
A:Redmi 10 comes with a 6000mAh enhanced battery, you can expect up to a two-day battery depending upon the usage.
A:Yes, there is a portrait mode on the 5MP front camera on the Redmi 10.
A:The fingerprint sensor has been included inside the camera module enabling a superior level of security & privacy.
A:Yes, Redmi 10 comes with a 3.5mm headphone jack so you can use your earphones/headphones with the phone.
A:Redmi 10 features a 2+1 microSD slot, which means you can expand storage by another 512GB on top of the internal storage.
A:Yes, Redmi 10 comes with a 10W in box charger and 18W charging support.
A:Yes it has Corning Gorilla Glass 3

pros.Qualcomm Snapdragon 680 Processor: This phone comes with a blazing fast Qualcomm Snapdragon 680 processor that helps to play games and multitask with ease.
pros.6000 mAh Battery: The large 6000 mAh battery gives a long backup.

cons.Camera: The front and the rear camera quality is really poor. The rear camera is not 50MP as promised.
cons.Slow charging: It takes almost 3-8 hours to fully charge. Awfully slow charging with only 10-20% charge in one hour.
cons.17.04 cm (6.71) Display: Display quality is not upto the mark.

summary.verdict: The REDMI 10 is a good budget phone with decent features.
summary.Additional Information: Supports Dual Apps, Runs on MIUI 13 based on Android 11.
